title: Steiner: This pandemic has shown how fragile Formula 1 is
description: Haas F1 team principal Guenther Steiner joins the show to talk about the new revised calendar and how the budget caps will affect the teams.
itunes:title: Steiner: This pandemic has shown how fragile Formula 1 is
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Haas F1 team principal Guenther Steiner joins the show to talk about the new revised calendar and how the budget caps will affect the teams.
